entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:44 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -37.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early this morning. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
